title: Birds on a seashore
creator_credit: Institut für Film und Bild and Films Incorporated
brief_description: Shows the various sea birds which live in the world’s largest bird colony on the mainland and offshore islands of Peru and Chile. Records the cries and songs of the birds as they live and propagate in their natural habitat. No narration. Suitable for primary and secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Institut für Film und Bild and Films Incorporated
